title: Workspace accessibility
test_description: Validate that the Databricks workspace is accessible
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const workspaceStep = stepResults.get_workspace_list; const expected_result = 'HTTP 200 response'; const actual_result = 'HTTP ' + (workspaceStep.status || 'unknown') + ' response'; if (workspaceStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility', expected_result, actual_result }; } if (workspaceStep.status === 200) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Workspace is accessible', code: 'HTTP_200_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Workspace is not accessible', code: 'HTTP_ERROR', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
